text.section: A commercial or mixed-use revitalization program provides assistance for downtown or business area commercial management, promotion, and revitalization.

Assistance may be in an area such as:
market surveying, grantsmanship, organization, economic development, design, or similar services; or
facilitating establishment of a commercial district management authority.
